name: Witchdoktor by AJ Fernandez - Robusto
additionalNotes: The Witchdoktor cigars, made by AJ Fernández in its factory in Estelí, Nicaragua, are exclusive to JR Cigar. With Nicaraguan fillings and Dark Ecuador wraps, these cigars offer flavors of licorice, espresso, dark chocolate and leather. Their slow burning and sweet aroma make them a unique and satisfying smoking experience.
